name: Unstable Concoctions
description:
Unstable Concoctions

Mix Potions!

Destroy your Friends!

Get Creative!

Go Rock Climbing!

Or Die!

--------------------------------------------------

 Controls and Notes

Recommended to play in chrome with 2 controllers. :)

Game is still playable with mouse and keyboard + 1 controller.

This is for all the couch co-op fans out there.

----

- Left-Stick / WASD - Move

- Right-Stick / Mouse - Aim

- South Button / Space - Jump

- Left Bumper / Tab - Start Mixing Potions!

- All Right Buttons / Arrow Keys - Select Ingredients

- Right Bumper / Click - Throw your amazing creation!
